camzup.core

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Face2 Mesh2.getFace​(int i, Face2 target)
    Gets a face from the mesh.
    Face2[] Mesh2.getFaces()
    Gets an array of faces from the mesh.

    Gets the next value in the iterator.
    Face2 Mesh2.Face2Iterator.next​(Face2 target)
    Gets the next value in the iterator.
    Face2 Face2.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by an angle around the z axis.
    Face2 Face2.rotateZGlobal​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by an angle around the z axis.
    Face2 Face2.rotateZLocal​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by an angle around the z axis.
    Face2 Face2.scale​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar.
    Face2 Face2.scale​(Vec2 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a vector.
    Face2 Face2.scaleGlobal​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's position.
    Face2 Face2.scaleGlobal​(Vec2 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's position.
    Face2 Face2.scaleLocal​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; subtracts the face's center from each vertex, scales, then adds the center.
    Face2 Face2.scaleLocal​(Vec2 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; subtracts the face's center from each vertex, scales, then adds the center.
    Face2 Face2.set​(Vert2... vertices)
    Sets this face's vertices to refer to a an array.
    Face2 Face2.translate​(Vec2 v)
    Translates all coordinates in the face by a vector.
    Face2 Face2.translateGlobal​(Vec2 v)
    Translates all coordinates in the face by a vector; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's orientation.
    Methods in camzup.core with parameters of type Face2 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Vec2 Face2.centerMean​(Face2 face, Vec2 target)
    Finds the center of a face by averaging all the coordinates in its list of vertices.
    int Face2.compareTo​(Face2 face)
    Compares this face to another by hash code.
    static boolean Face2.contains​(Face2 face, Vec2 point)
    Evaluates whether the face contains a point.
    static Vec2 Face2.eval​(Face2 face, float step, Vec2 target)
    Finds a point on the face's perimeter given a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    static Curve2 Curve2.fromMeshFace​(Face2 face, Curve2 target)
    Creates a curve from a face in a mesh.
    Face2 Mesh2.getFace​(int i, Face2 target)
    Gets a face from the mesh.
    static float Ray2.intersectFace​(Ray2 ray, Face2 face, java.util.List<Vec2> hits)
    Finds an intersection between a ray and an face.
    static boolean Face2.isCCW​(Face2 face)
    Returns whether a face is wound in the counter-clockwise direction, i.e., if its winding number is greater than zero.
    static boolean Face2.isCW​(Face2 face)
    Returns whether a face is wound in the clockwise direction, i.e., if its winding number is less than zero.
    Face2 Mesh2.Face2Iterator.next​(Face2 target)
    Gets the next value in the iterator.
    static float Face2.perimeter​(Face2 face)
    Calculates the perimeter of a face by summing the Euclidean distance between vertices.
    static float Face2.winding​(Face2 face)
    Calculates the winding number of the face by summing the cross products of any two pair of edges.
